document_data.name: ''Cloak of Black Flame''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cloaks of Black Flame''''' were [[enchanted]] defensive [[cloak]]s from the [[Sorcere]] of [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.Description: ''Cloaks of Black Flame'' were thick black cloaks that resembled a tangle of black spiderwebs. Once such cloak was put on, its wild cobwebbed texture smoothed into a black masterfully-woven cloth.
document_data.Powers: These cloaks, originally of [[drow]] make, were imbued with magics that protected the wearers from spells and abilities that sapped the strength, energy, and experiences.
document_data.History: The first ''cloaks of Black Flame'' originated in the drow Sorcere wizardly academy of Menzoberranzan. They were used by the school's [[necromancer]]s who often needed protection agains their own [[undead]] creations. By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], similar cloaks were created to be worn by the inhabitants of the surface world.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Vejoni H. Wyzz]]: a planar-traveling [[wizard]] who briefly stayed in the hamlet of [[Liam's Hold]] along the [[Trade Way]] in [[1372 DR]].
